title: SCP-049

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once per game, you may deal an unstoppable attack.
- You may instead revive a dead player secretly as an SCP-049-2 instance.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- SCP-049-2 instances cannot vote, but can perform an astral factional kill, use a nerfed version of its original ability, or roleblock another player. It lasts for 2 days before dying.
- Your unstoppable attack will be refunded if it fails for whatever reason (Target in jail, Defense too high, Healed by a Doctor, ect.).

desc:
Post 768
*SCP-049 will become hostile with individuals it sees as being affected by the Pestilence, often having to be restrained should it encounter such. If left unchecked, SCP-049 will generally attempt to kill any such individual.*
